startScreen.title: Sneaky Link EditionðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦
description: When you and another person are fucking up but don't want anyone to know about it.
You tryna be my sneaky link or sum?
This is a questions game to play with your sneaky link. There are only 2 rules:
2. The person who sent the last 'u up?' text goes first.
Warning: This may be the most you've ever talked to them.

questions.question: What did you think I would be like in bed? What am I actually like?
What would you assume about me based off of my social media?
What's my name in your contacts?
WILDCARD: If we had to try something new tonight, what would it be? Bonus: Do it.
What's the best text you could receive from me?
What is the latest time you would respond to a 'u up?' text from me?
WILDCARD: What's your favorite part of my body? Prove it.
When do you think about me most?
What's something about you that might surprise me?
What am I good at? (Describe in detail)
What is your current go-to late night snack?
When I show up, what outfit do you like to see me in?
WILDCARD: Come up with a secret code word/phrase to text each other.
Why do you keep coming back?
